description.@en: “Cleanliness is next to godliness,” as they say.

data.notes:
Intellectual Trait

Professions of this Archetype are learned, lettered and understand the value of the written word. They are of higher means, malleable and socially mobile.

effect.@en: You are immune to Smallpox. Whenever you are exposed to an Ailment, sacrifice one Determination to become immune to it.
